Redlands.Bryn Mawr, California: Bryn Mawr (pronounced  from Welsh for "big hill"), formerly Nahant, Redlands Junction and West Redlands, is a formerly unincorporated community that was annexed by the city of Loma Linda in San Bernardino County, California, United States. As of 2000, its population numbered 213. Bryn Mawr is bordered on the east by Redlands.
